postOp(uint8,bytes,uint256,uint256).details: Verifies the sender is the entrypoint.

params.actualGasCost: the actual amount paid (by account or paymaster) for this UserOperation
params.actualUserOpFeePerGas: total gas used by this UserOperation (including preVerification, creation, validation and execution)

validatePaymasterUserOp((address,uint256.details: Validates whether the paymaster is willing to pay for the user operation. See {IAccount-validateUserOp} for additional information on the return value. NOTE: Bundlers will reject this method if it modifies the state, unless it's whitelisted.
